text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item specifications and item specification.

Item specification:
Hello Kitty Little Girls' Pink and White Pajamas

Item specifications:
Hello Kitty printed on the front
Long-sleeved top and long-leg bottoms
Elastic waistband
flame resistant fabric
Machine washable
Material: 100% polyester
Fit: Relaxed



Product description:
text.Response A: These are Hello Kitty brand two-piece pajamas. These pajamas have long sleeves and long leg bottoms. The pajamas are 100% polyester, flame resistant, and machine washable. The bottoms have an elastic waistband and a relaxed fit. Girls can snuggle and stay warm in these Hello Kitty pajamas
text.Response B: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset will make your kid eager for bath time, with a steep track that easily attaches to the tub with suction cups.  The child will be thrilled to watch the included car hurtle down the track through the included attached flames when they tip the water filled cup which propels the car.

100.displayed_text:
Prompt

The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item specifications and item specification.

Item specification:
Hello Kitty Little Girls' Pink and White Pajamas

Item specifications:
Hello Kitty printed on the front
Long-sleeved top and long-leg bottoms
Elastic waistband
flame resistant fabric
Machine washable
Material: 100% polyester
Fit: Relaxed



Product description:

Response A

These are Hello Kitty brand two-piece pajamas. These pajamas have long sleeves and long leg bottoms. The pajamas are 100% polyester, flame resistant, and machine washable. The bottoms have an elastic waistband and a relaxed fit. Girls can snuggle and stay warm in these Hello Kitty pajamas

Response B

The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset will make your kid eager for bath time, with a steep track that easily attaches to the tub with suction cups. The child will be thrilled to watch the included car hurtle down the track through the included attached flames when they tip the water filled cup which propels the car.
